title: True Sacrifice
description: Jasper. Justice. Jax.My three demon mates. See I was sacrificed in some random ritual and woke up in Hell.Oh, did I mention they’re Princes of Hell?I guess that makes me Morrigan Princess of Hell. Lucifer is here, he says, “Hi.”So now I must navigate learning all my new powers, as well as learning my pack of mates.We were trying not to draw so much attention to how powerful I was, until I also emerged as a vampire.Maybe my sacrifice wasn’t so random after all.*18+ Reverse Harem Dark Romance. Warning, this book contains graphic sex scenes featuring darker elements such as blood play, masochism, rope play, and other such themes. Please be advised of complete trigger warning found in the beginning of the book before indulging. *
author: Kay  Wilder
